overview: Come along on a journey with eight women who are looking for love. Each one decides to go to a dating agency in the hopes of finding their soul mate. And while it may turn out the couplings don’t result in lifelong relationships, they certainly lead to steamy bedroom encounters! The women are passionate together, touching and tasting every inch of flesh as it’s revealed. They 69, scissor each other, discover each intimate place with eager fingers and lips, and leave one another completely satisfied!
tagline: It's all in the CONNECTION woman to woman!
title: Lesbian Love Connections
